 1722:         logger:remove_handler(?MODULE)
 1723:     end,
 1724: 
 1725:     ok.
 1726: 
 1727: 
 1728: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1729: %% Test restart escalation on a simple_one_for_one supervisor.
 1730: simple_one_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1731:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1732:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1733: 	     worker, []},
 1734:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 4, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1735:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [error]),
 1736:     link(CPid1),
 1737:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1738:     link(CPid2),
 1739: 
 1740:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child, abnormal),
 1741:     check_exit([SupPid, CPid2]).
 1742: 
 1743: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1744: %% Test the rest_for_one base case.
 1745: rest_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1746:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1747:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1748: 	     worker, []},
 1749:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1750: 	     worker, []},
 1751:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1752: 	     worker, []},
 1753:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1754:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1755:     link(CPid1),
 1756:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1757:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child3),
 1758:     link(CPid3),
 1759:     [3,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1760: 
 1761:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1762: 
 1763:     %% Check that Cpid3 did die
 1764:     check_exit([CPid3]),
 1765: 
 1766:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1767:     is_in_child_list([CPid1], Children),
 1768: 
 1769:     if length(Children) == 3 ->
 1770: 	    ok;
 1771:        true ->
 1772: 	    ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1773:     end,
 1774:     [3,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1775: 
 1776:     %% Test that no old children is still alive
 1777:     Pids = lists:map(fun({_,P,_,_}) -> P end, Children),
 1778:     not_in_child_list([CPid2, CPid3], Pids),
 1779:     in_child_list([CPid1], Pids),
 1780: 
 1781:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1782:     [{child3, Pid3, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1783: 
 1784:     terminate(SupPid, Pid3, child3, abnormal),
 1785: 
 1786:     [_,{child2, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1787: 
 1788:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, child2, abnormal),
 1789:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1790: 
 1791: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1792: %% Test restart escalation on a rest_for_one supervisor.
 1793: rest_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1794:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1795:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1796: 	     worker, []},
 1797:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1798: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1799: 	     worker, []},
 1800:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1801:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1802:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1803:     link(CPid2),
 1804: 
 1805:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1806:     check_exit([CPid2, SupPid]).
 1807: 
 1808: 
 1809: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1810: %% Test that the supervisor terminates a restarted child when a different
 1811: %% child fails to start.
 1812: rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1813:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1814:     Self = self(),
 1815:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child1, Self]},
 1816: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1817:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child2, Self]},
 1818: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1819:     Children = [Child1, Child2],
 1820:     StarterFun = fun() ->
 1821: 	    {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 3, 3600}, Children}}),
 1822: 	    Self ! {sup_pid, SupPid},
 1823: 	    receive {stop, Self} -> ok end
 1824:     end,
 1825:     StarterPid = spawn_link(StarterFun),
 1826:     Ok = {{ok, undefined}, Self},
 1827:     %% Let the children start.
 1828:     Child1Pid = receive {child1, Pid1} -> Pid1 end,
 1829:     Child1Pid ! Ok,
 1830:     Child2Pid = receive {child2, Pid2} -> Pid2 end,
 1831:     Child2Pid ! Ok,
 1832:     %% Supervisor started.
 1833:     SupPid = receive {sup_pid, Pid} -> Pid end,
 1834:     link(SupPid),
 1835:     exit(Child1Pid, die),
 1836:     %% Let child1 restart but don't let child2.
 1837:     Child1Pid2  = receive {child1, Pid3} -> Pid3 end,
 1838:     Child1Pid2 ! Ok,
 1839:     Child2Pid2 = receive {child2, Pid4} -> Pid4 end,
 1840:     Child2Pid2 ! {{stop, normal}, Self},
 1841: 	%% Let child2 restart.
 1842:     receive
 1843: 	{child2, Child2Pid3} ->
 1844: 	    Child2Pid3 ! Ok;
 1845: 	{child1, _Child1Pid3} ->
 1846: 	    exit(SupPid, kill),
 1847: 	    check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]),
 1848: 	    ct:fail({restarting_started_child, Child1Pid2})
 1849:     end,
 1850:     StarterPid ! {stop, Self},
 1851:     check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]).
 1852: 
 1853: 
 1854: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1855: %% Test that the supervisor does not hang forever if the child unliks
 1856: %% and then is terminated by the supervisor.
 1857: child_unlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1858: 
 1859:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1860: 
 1861:     Child = {naughty_child, {naughty_child, 
 1862: 			     start_link, [SupPid]}, permanent, 
 1863: 	     1000, worker, [supervisor_SUITE]},
 1864: 
 1865:     {ok, _ChildPid} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
 1866: 
 1867:     Pid = spawn(supervisor, terminate_child, [SupPid, naughty_child]),
 1868: 
 1869:     SupPid ! foo,
 1870:     timer:sleep(5000),
 1871:     %% If the supervisor did not hang it will have got rid of the 
 1872:     %% foo message that we sent.
 1873:     case erlang:process_info(SupPid, message_queue_len) of
 1874: 	{message_queue_len, 0}->
 1875: 	    ok;
 1876: 	_ ->
 1877: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 1878: 	    ct:fail(supervisor_hangs)
 1879:     end.
 1880: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1881: %% Test a basic supervison tree.
 1882: tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1883:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1884: 
 1885:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1886: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1887: 	      worker, []},
 1888:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1889: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1890: 	      worker, []},
 1891:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1892: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1893: 	      worker, []},
 1894:     Child4 = {child4, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1895: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1896: 	      worker, []},
 1897: 
 1898:     ChildSup1 = {supchild1, 
 1899: 		 {supervisor, start_link,
 1900: 		  [?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, [Child1, Child2]}}]},
 1901: 		 permanent, infinity,
 1902: 		 supervisor, []},
 1903:     ChildSup2 = {supchild2, 
 1904: 		 {supervisor, start_link, 
 1905: 		  [?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}]},
 1906: 		 permanent, infinity,
 1907: 		 supervisor, []},
 1908:     ChildSup3 = {supchild3,
 1909: 		 {supervisor, start_link,
 1910: 		  [?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}]},
 1911: 		 transient, infinity,
 1912: 		 supervisor, []},
 1913: 
 1914:     %% Top supervisor
 1915:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1916: 
 1917:     %% Child supervisors  
 1918:     {ok, Sup1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, ChildSup1),
 1919:     {ok, Sup2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, ChildSup2),
 1920:     {ok, _Sup3} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, ChildSup3),
 1921:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, supchild3),
 1922:     [3,2,3,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1923: 
 1924:     %% Workers
 1925:     [{_, CPid2, _, _},{_, CPid1, _, _}] =
 1926: 	supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 1927:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup1),
 1928:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(Sup2),
 1929: 
 1930:     %% Dynamic children
 1931:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 1932:     {ok, CPid4} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child4),
 1933:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup1),
 1934:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup2),
 1935: 
 1936:     %% Test that the only the process that dies is restarted
 1937:     terminate(Sup2, CPid4, child4, abnormal),
 1938: 
 1939:     [{_, CPid2, _, _},{_, CPid1, _, _}] =
 1940: 	supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 1941:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup1),
 1942: 
 1943:     [{_, NewCPid4, _, _},{_, CPid3, _, _}] =
 1944: 	supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 1945:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup2),
 1946: 
 1947:     false = NewCPid4 == CPid4,
 1948: 
 1949:     %% Test that supervisor tree is restarted, but not dynamic children.
 1950:     terminate(Sup2, CPid3, child3, abnormal),
 1951: 
 1952:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1953: 
 1954:     [{supchild3, NewSup3, _, _},
 1955:      {supchild2, NewSup2, _, _},
 1956:      {supchild1, NewSup1, _, _}] =
 1957: 	supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1958:     [3,3,3,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1959: 
 1960:     [{child2, _, _, _},{child1, _, _, _}]  =
 1961: 	supervisor:which_children(NewSup1),
 1962:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(NewSup1),
 1963: 
 1964:     [] = supervisor:which_children(NewSup2),
 1965:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(NewSup2),
 1966: 
 1967:     [] = supervisor:which_children(NewSup3),
 1968:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(NewSup3).
 1969: 
 1970: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1971: %% Test count_children
 1972: count_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1973:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1974:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1975: 	     worker, []},
 1976:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1977:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 1978: 
 1979:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1980:     ChildCount = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1981: 
 1982:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore2 <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 1983: 
 1984:     ChildCount2 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1985:     Children2 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1986: 
 1987:     ChildCount3 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1988:     Children3 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1989: 
 1990:     1000 = length(Children),
 1991:     [1,1000,0,1000] = ChildCount,
 1992:     2000 = length(Children2),
 1993:     [1,2000,0,2000] = ChildCount2,
 1994:     Children3 = Children2,
 1995:     ChildCount3 = ChildCount2,
 1996: 
 1997:     [terminate(SupPid, Pid, child, kill) || {undefined, Pid, worker, _Modules} <- Children3],
 1998:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1999: 
 2000: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2001: %% Test count_children for simple_one_for_one, when children are supervisors
 2002: count_children_supervisor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2003:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2004:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, infinity,
 2005: 	     supervisor, []},
 2006:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 2007:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 2008: 
 2009:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2010:     ChildCount = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2011: 
 2012:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore2 <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 2013: 
 2014:     ChildCount2 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2015:     Children2 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2016: 
 2017:     ChildCount3 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2018:     Children3 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2019: 
 2020:     1000 = length(Children),
 2021:     [1,1000,1000,0] = ChildCount,
 2022:     2000 = length(Children2),
 2023:     [1,2000,2000,0] = ChildCount2,
 2024:     Children3 = Children2,
 2025:     ChildCount3 = ChildCount2,
 2026: 
 2027:     [terminate(SupPid, Pid, child, kill) || {undefined, Pid, supervisor, _Modules} <- Children3],
 2028:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).

 2030: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2031: %% Test count_children when some children are restarting
 2032: count_restarting_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2033:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2034:     Child = {child, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child_noreg, []},
 2035: 	     permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2036:     %% 2 sek delay on failing restart (see supervisor_deadlock.erl) ->
 2037:     %% MaxR=20, MaxT=10 should ensure a restart loop when starting and
 2038:     %% restarting 3 instances of the child (as below)
 2039:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 20, 10}, [Child]}}),
 2040: 
 2041:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2042:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2043:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2044: 
 2045:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2046:     {ok, Ch1_1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 2047:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2048:     {ok, Ch1_2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 2049:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2050:     {ok, Ch1_3} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 2051:     [1,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2052: 
 2053:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch1_1),
 2054:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch1_2),
 2055:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch1_3),
 2056:     ct:sleep(400),
 2057:     [1,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2058:     [Ch2_1, Ch2_2, Ch2_3] = [C || {_,C,_,_} <- supervisor:which_children(SupPid)],
 2059: 
 2060:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2061:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch2_1),
 2062:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch2_2),
 2063:     ct:sleep(4000),	   % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2064:     [1,1,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2065: 
 2066:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2067:     ct:sleep(4000),	   % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2068:     [1,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2069: 
 2070:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Ch2_3),
 2071:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2072:     [Ch3_1, Ch3_2] = [C || {_,C,_,_} <- supervisor:which_children(SupPid)],
 2073:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Ch3_1),
 2074:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2075:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Ch3_2),
 2076:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid).
 2077: 
 2078: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2079: %% Test get_callback_module
 2080: get_callback_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2081:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 2082: 	     worker, []},
 2083:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 2084:     supervisor_SUITE = supervisor:get_callback_module(SupPid).
 2085: 
 2086: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2087: %% Temporary children shall not be restarted so they should not save
 2088: %% start parameters, as it potentially can take up a huge amount of
 2089: %% memory for no purpose.
 2090: do_not_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2091:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2092:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(one_for_all),
 2093:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(one_for_one),
 2094:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one),
 2095:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(simple_one_for_one).
 2096: 
 2097: start_children(_,_, 0) ->
 2098:     ok;
 2099: start_children(Sup, Args, N) ->
 2100:     Spec = child_spec(Args, N),
 2101:     {ok, _, _} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, Spec),
 2102:     start_children(Sup, Args, N-1).
 2103: 
 2104: child_spec([_|_] = SimpleOneForOneArgs, _) ->
 2105:     SimpleOneForOneArgs;
 2106: child_spec({Name, MFA, RestartType, Shutdown, Type, Modules}, N) ->
 2107:     NewName = list_to_atom((atom_to_list(Name) ++ integer_to_list(N))),
 2108:     {NewName, MFA, RestartType, Shutdown, Type, Modules}.
 2109: 
 2110: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2111: %% Temporary children shall not be restarted so supervisors should not
 2112: %% save their spec when they terminate.
 2113: do_not_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2114:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2115:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, kill),
 2116:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, kill),
 2117:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, kill),
 2118: 
 2119:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, normal),
 2120:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, normal),
 2121:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, normal),
 2122: 
 2123:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, abnormal),
 2124:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, abnormal),
 2125:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, abnormal),
 2126: 
 2127:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, supervisor),
 2128:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, supervisor),
 2129:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, supervisor).
 2130: 
 2131: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2132: dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(simple_one_for_one = Type) ->
 2133:     Permanent = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2134: 		 permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2135:     Transient = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2136: 		 transient, 1000, worker, []},
 2137:     Temporary = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2138: 		 temporary, 1000, worker, []},
 2139:     {ok, Sup1} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, [Permanent]}}),
 2140:     {ok, Sup2} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, [Transient]}}),
 2141:     {ok, Sup3} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, [Temporary]}}),
 2142: 
 2143:     LargeList = lists:duplicate(10, "Potentially large"),
 2144: 
 2145:     start_children(Sup1, [LargeList], 100),
 2146:     start_children(Sup2, [LargeList], 100),
 2147:     start_children(Sup3, [LargeList], 100),
 2148: 
 2149:     Size1 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup1)),
 2150:     Size2 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup2)),
 2151:     Size3 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup3)),
 2152: 
 2153:     true = (Size3 < Size1)  and  (Size3 < Size2),
 2154: 
 2155:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 2156:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 2157:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown);
 2158: 
 2159: dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(Type) ->
 2160:     {ok, Sup1} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2161:     {ok, Sup2} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2162:     {ok, Sup3} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2163: 
 2164:     LargeList = lists:duplicate(10, "Potentially large"),
 2165: 
 2166:     Permanent = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [LargeList]},
 2167: 		 permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2168:     Transient = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [LargeList]},
 2169: 		 transient, 1000, worker, []},
 2170:     Temporary = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, [LargeList]},
 2171: 		 temporary, 1000, worker, []},
 2172: 
 2173:     start_children(Sup1, Permanent, 100),
 2174:     start_children(Sup2, Transient, 100),
 2175:     start_children(Sup3, Temporary, 100),
 2176: 
 2177:     Size1 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup1)),
 2178:     Size2 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup2)),
 2179:     Size3 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup3)),
 2180: 
 2181:     true = (Size3 < Size1)  and  (Size3 < Size2),
 2182: 
 2183:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 2184:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 2185:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown).
 2186: 
 2187: dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(Type, TerminateHow)->
 2188:     {ok, Sup} =
 2189: 	supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2190: 
 2191:     Permanent = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2192: 		 permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2193:     Transient = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2194: 		 transient, 1000, worker, []},
 2195:     Temporary = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2196: 		 temporary, 1000, worker, []},
 2197: 
 2198:     permanent_child_spec_saved(Permanent, Sup, TerminateHow),
 2199: 
 2200:     transient_child_spec_saved(Transient, Sup, TerminateHow),
 2201: 
 2202:     temporary_child_spec_not_saved(Temporary, Sup, TerminateHow),
 2203: 
 2204:     terminate(Sup, shutdown).
 2205: 
 2206: permanent_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, supervisor = TerminateHow) ->
 2207:     already_present(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow);
 2208: 
 2209: permanent_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, TerminateHow) ->
 2210:     restarted(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow).
 2211: 
 2212: transient_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, supervisor = TerminateHow) ->
 2213:     already_present(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow);
 2214: 
 2215: transient_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, normal = TerminateHow) ->
 2216:     already_present(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow);
 2217: 
 2218: transient_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, TerminateHow) ->
 2219:     restarted(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow).
 2220: 
 2221: temporary_child_spec_not_saved({Id, _,_,_,_,_} = ChildSpec, Sup, TerminateHow) ->
 2222:     {ok, Pid} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2223:     terminate(Sup, Pid, Id, TerminateHow),
 2224:     {ok, _} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec).
 2225: 
 2226: already_present(Sup, {Id,_,_,_,_,_} = ChildSpec, TerminateHow) ->
 2227:     {ok, Pid} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2228:     terminate(Sup, Pid, Id, TerminateHow),
 2229:     {error, already_present} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2230:     {ok, _} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup, Id).
 2231: 
 2232: restarted(Sup, {Id,_,_,_,_,_} = ChildSpec, TerminateHow) ->
 2233:     {ok, Pid} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2234:     terminate(Sup, Pid, Id, TerminateHow),
 2235:     %% Permanent processes will be restarted by the supervisor
 2236:     %% when not terminated by api
 2237:     {error, {already_started, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec).
 2238: 
 2239: 
 2240: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2241: %% OTP-9242: Pids for dynamic temporary children were saved as a list,
 2242: %% which caused bad scaling when adding/deleting many processes.
 2243: simple_one_for_one_scale_many_temporary_children(_Config) ->
 2244:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2245:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 2246: 	     worker, []},
 2247:     {ok, _SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 2248: 
 2249:     C1 = [begin 
 2250: 		 {ok,P} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[]), 
 2251: 		 P
 2252: 	     end || _<- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 2253:     {T1,done} = timer:tc(?MODULE,terminate_all_children,[C1]),
 2254:     
 2255:     C2 = [begin 
 2256: 		 {ok,P} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[]), 
 2257: 		 P
 2258: 	     end || _<- lists:seq(1,10000)],
 2259:     {T2,done} = timer:tc(?MODULE,terminate_all_children,[C2]),
 2260:     
 2261:     if T1 > 0 ->
 2262: 	    Scaling = T2 div T1,
 2263: 	    if Scaling > 50 ->
 2264: 		    %% The scaling shoul be linear (i.e.10, really), but we
 2265: 		    %% give some extra here to avoid failing the test
 2266: 		    %% unecessarily.
 2267: 		    ct:fail({bad_scaling,Scaling});
 2268: 	       true ->
 2269: 		    ok
 2270: 	    end;
 2271:        true ->
 2272: 	    %% Means T2 div T1 -> infinity
 2273: 	    ok
 2274:     end.
 2275:     
 2276: 
 2277: terminate_all_children([C|Cs]) ->
 2278:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,C),
 2279:     terminate_all_children(Cs);
 2280: terminate_all_children([]) ->
 2281:     done.
 2282: 
 2283: 
 2284: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2285: %% OTP-9212. Restart of global supervisor.
 2286: simple_global_supervisor(_Config) ->
 2287:     kill_supervisor(),
 2288:     kill_worker(),
 2289:     exit_worker(),
 2290:     restart_worker(),
 2291:     ok.
 2292: 
 2293: kill_supervisor() ->
 2294:     {Top, Sup2_1, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2295: 
 2296:     %% Killing a supervisor isn't really supported, but try it anyway...
 2297:     exit(Sup2_1, kill),
 2298:     timer:sleep(200),
 2299:     Sup2_2 = global:whereis_name(sup2),
 2300:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2301:     true = is_pid(Sup2_2),
 2302:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2303:     true = Sup2_1 =/= Sup2_2,
 2304:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2305: 
 2306:     stop9212(Top).
 2307: 
 2308: handle_info({fail, With, After}, _State) ->
 2309:     timer:sleep(After),
 2310:     erlang:error(With).
 2311: 
 2312: kill_worker() ->
 2313:     {Top, _Sup2, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2314:     exit(Server_1, kill),
 2315:     timer:sleep(200),
 2316:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2317:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2318:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2319:     stop9212(Top).
 2320: 
 2321: exit_worker() ->
 2322:     %% Very much the same as kill_worker().
 2323:     {Top, _Sup2, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2324:     Server_1 ! {fail, normal, 0},
 2325:     timer:sleep(200),
 2326:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2327:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2328:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2329:     stop9212(Top).
 2330: 
 2331: restart_worker() ->
 2332:     {Top, _Sup2, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2333:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child({global, sup2}, child),
 2334:     {ok, _Child} = supervisor:restart_child({global, sup2}, child),
 2335:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2336:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2337:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2338:     stop9212(Top).
 2339: 
 2340: start9212() ->
 2341:     Middle = {middle,{?MODULE,middle9212,[]}, permanent,2000,supervisor,[]},
 2342:     InitResult = {ok, {{one_for_all,3,60}, [Middle]}},
 2343:     {ok, TopPid} = start_link(InitResult),
 2344: 
 2345:     Sup2 = global:whereis_name(sup2),
 2346:     Server = global:whereis_name(server),
 2347:     true = is_pid(Sup2),
 2348:     true = is_pid(Server),
 2349:     {TopPid, Sup2, Server}.
 2350: 
 2351: stop9212(Top) ->
 2352:     Old = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2353:     exit(Top, kill),
 2354:     timer:sleep(200),
 2355:     undefined = global:whereis_name(sup2),
 2356:     undefined = global:whereis_name(server),
 2357:     check_exit([Top]),
 2358:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, Old),
 2359:     ok.
 2360: 
 2361: middle9212() ->
 2362:     Child = {child, {?MODULE,gen_server9212,[]},permanent, 2000, worker, []},
 2363:     InitResult = {ok, {{one_for_all,3,60}, [Child]}},
 2364:     supervisor:start_link({global,sup2}, ?MODULE, InitResult).
 2365: 
 2366: gen_server9212() ->
 2367:     InitResult = {ok, []},
 2368:     gen_server:start_link({global,server}, ?MODULE, InitResult, []).
 2369: 
 2370: 
 2371: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2372: %% Test that child and supervisor can be shutdown while hanging in restart loop.
 2373: %% See OTP-9549.
 2374: hanging_restart_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2375:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2376:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 8, 10}, []}}),
 2377:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child, []},
 2378: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2379: 
 2380:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2381:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2382:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2383: 
 2384:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 2385:     link(CPid1),
 2386: 
 2387:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2388:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2389:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2390: 
 2391:     {error, already_present} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 2392:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 2393:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
 2394:     [{child1,restarting,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2395:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2396: 
 2397:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
 2398:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, error),
 2399:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2400: 
 2401:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2402:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 2403:     link(CPid2),
 2404: 
 2405:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2406:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2407:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2408: 
 2409:     %% Terminating supervisor.
 2410:     %% OTP-9549 fixes so this does not give a timetrap timeout -
 2411:     %% i.e. that supervisor does not hang in restart loop.
 2412:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 2413: 
 2414:     %% Check that child died with reason from 'restart' request above
 2415:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, error),
 2416:     undefined = whereis(sup_test),
 2417:     ok.
 2418: 
 2419: hanging_restart_loop_rest_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2420:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2421:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 8, 10}, []}}),
 2422:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2423: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2424:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child, []},
 2425: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2426:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2427: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2428: 
 2429:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2430:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2431:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2432: 
 2433:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 2434:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 2435:     link(CPid2),
 2436:     {ok, _CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child3),
 2437: 
 2438:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2439:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2440:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2441: 
 2442:     {error, already_present} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 2443:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child2),
 2444:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child2),
 2445:     [{child3,undefined,worker,[]},
 2446:      {child2,restarting,worker,[]},
 2447:      {child1,CPid1,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2448:     [3,1,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2449: 
 2450:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child2),
 2451:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, error),
 2452:     [{child3,undefined,worker,[]},
 2453:      {child2,undefined,worker,[]},
 2454:      {child1,CPid1,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2455: 
 2456:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2457:     {ok, CPid22} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child2),
 2458:     link(CPid22),
 2459: 
 2460:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2461:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2462:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2463: 
 2464:     %% Terminating supervisor.
 2465:     %% OTP-9549 fixes so this does not give a timetrap timeout -
 2466:     %% i.e. that supervisor does not hang in restart loop.
 2467:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 2468: 
 2469:     %% Check that child died with reason from 'restart' request above
 2470:     check_exit_reason(CPid22, error),
 2471:     undefined = whereis(sup_test),
 2472:     ok.
 2473: 
 2474: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2475: %% Test that child and supervisor can be shutdown while hanging in
 2476: %% restart loop, simple_one_for_one.
 2477: %% See OTP-9549.
 2478: hanging_restart_loop_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2479:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2480:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child, []},
 2481: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2482:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 8, 10}, [Child1]}}),
 2483: 
 2484:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2485:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2486:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2487: 
 2488:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 2489:     link(CPid1),
 2490: 
 2491:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2492:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2493:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2494: 
 2495:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 2496:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
 2497:     [{undefined,restarting,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2498:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2499: 
 2500:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, CPid1),
 2501:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, error),
 2502:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2503: 
 2504:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2505:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 2506:     link(CPid2),
 2507: 
 2508:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2509:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2510:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2511: 
 2512:     %% Terminating supervisor.
 2513:     %% OTP-9549 fixes so this does not give a timetrap timeout -
 2514:     %% i.e. that supervisor does not hang in restart loop.
 2515:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 2516: 
 2517:     %% Check that child died with reason from 'restart' request above
 2518:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, error),
 2519:     undefined = whereis(sup_test),
 2520:     ok.
 2521: 
 2522: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2523: %% Test the code_change function
 2524: code_change(_Config) ->
 2525:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2526: 
 2527:     SupFlags = {one_for_one, 0, 1},
 2528:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {SupFlags, []}}),
 2529:     [] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2530: 
 2531:     %% Change supervisor flags
 2532:     S1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2533:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {{one_for_one, 1, 3}, []}}),
 2534:     S2 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2535:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 2536: 
 2537:     %% Faulty childspec
 2538:     FaultyChild = {child1, permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []}, % missing start
 2539:     {error,{error,{invalid_child_spec,FaultyChild}}} =
 2540: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{SupFlags,[FaultyChild]}}),
 2541: 
 2542:     %% Add child1 and child2
 2543:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2544: 	      permanent, 2000, worker, []},
 2545:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2546: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2547:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{SupFlags,[Child1,Child2]}}),
 2548:     %% Children are not automatically started
 2549:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child1),
 2550:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child2),
 2551:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2552: 
 2553:     %% Change child1, remove child2 and add child3
 2554:     Child11 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2555: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2556:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2557: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2558:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {SupFlags, [Child11,Child3]}}),
 2559:     %% Children are not deleted on upgrade, so it is ok that child2 is
 2560:     %% still here
 2561:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child3,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] =
 2562: 	supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2563: 
 2564:     %% Ignore during upgrade
 2565:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,ignore),
 2566: 
 2567:     %% Error during upgrade
 2568:     {error, faulty_return} = fake_upgrade(Pid,faulty_return),
 2569: 
 2570:     %% Faulty flags
 2571:     {error,{error, {invalid_intensity,faulty_intensity}}} =
 2572: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {{one_for_one,faulty_intensity,1}, []}}),
 2573:     {error,{error,{bad_flags, faulty_flags}}} =
 2574: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {faulty_flags, []}}),
 2575: 
 2576:     terminate(Pid,shutdown).
 2577: 
 2578: code_change_map(_Config) ->
 2579:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2580: 
 2581:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
 2582:     [] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2583: 
 2584:     %% Change supervisor flags
 2585:     S1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2586:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {#{intensity=>1, period=>3}, []}}),
 2587:     S2 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2588:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 2589: 
 2590:     %% Faulty childspec
 2591:     FaultyChild = #{id=>faulty_child},
 2592:     {error,{error,missing_start}} =
 2593: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{#{},[FaultyChild]}}),
 2594: 
 2595:     %% Add child1 and child2
 2596:     Child1 = #{id=>child1,
 2597: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2598: 	       shutdown=>2000},
 2599:     Child2 = #{id=>child2,
 2600: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2601:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{#{},[Child1,Child2]}}),
 2602:     %% Children are not automatically started
 2603:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child1),
 2604:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child2),
 2605:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2606:     {ok,#{shutdown:=2000}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid,child1),
 2607: 
 2608:     %% Change child1, remove child2 and add child3
 2609:     Child11 = #{id=>child1,
 2610: 		start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2611: 		shutdown=>1000},
 2612:     Child3 = #{id=>child3,
 2613: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2614:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {#{}, [Child11,Child3]}}),
 2615:     %% Children are not deleted on upgrade, so it is ok that child2 is
 2616:     %% still here
 2617:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child3,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] =
 2618: 	supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2619:     {ok,#{shutdown:=1000}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid,child1),
 2620: 
 2621:     %% Ignore during upgrade
 2622:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,ignore),
 2623: 
 2624:     %% Error during upgrade
 2625:     {error, faulty_return} = fake_upgrade(Pid,faulty_return),
 2626: 
 2627:     %% Faulty flags
 2628:     {error,{error, {invalid_intensity,faulty_intensity}}} =
 2629: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {#{intensity=>faulty_intensity}, []}}),
 2630: 
 2631:     terminate(Pid,shutdown).
 2632: 
 2633: code_change_simple(_Config) ->
 2634:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2635: 
 2636:     SimpleChild1 = {child1,{supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
 2637: 		    brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2638:     SimpleFlags = {simple_one_for_one, 0, 1},
 2639:     {ok, SimplePid}  = start_link({ok, {SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1]}}),
 2640:     %% Change childspec
 2641:     SimpleChild11 = {child1,{supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
 2642: 		    1000, worker, []},
 2643:     ok = fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild11]}}),
 2644: 
 2645:     %% Attempt to add child
 2646:     SimpleChild2 = {child2,{supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
 2647: 		    brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2648: 
 2649:     {error, {error, {ok,{[_,_],_}}}} =
 2650: 	fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1,SimpleChild2]}}),
 2651: 
 2652:     %% Attempt to remove child
 2653:     {error, {error, {ok,{[],_}}}} = fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[]}}),
 2654: 
 2655:     terminate(SimplePid,shutdown),
 2656:     ok.
 2657: 
 2658: code_change_simple_map(_Config) ->
 2659:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2660: 
 2661:     SimpleChild1 = #{id=>child1,
 2662: 		     start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2663:     SimpleFlags = #{strategy=>simple_one_for_one},
 2664:     {ok, SimplePid}  = start_link({ok, {SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1]}}),
 2665:     %% Change childspec
 2666:     SimpleChild11 = #{id=>child1,
 2667: 		      start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2668: 		      shutdown=>1000},
 2669:     ok = fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild11]}}),
 2670: 
 2671:     %% Attempt to add child
 2672:     SimpleChild2 = #{id=>child2,
 2673: 		     start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2674:     {error, {error, {ok, {[_,_],_}}}} =
 2675: 	fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1,SimpleChild2]}}),
 2676: 
 2677:     %% Attempt to remove child
 2678:     {error, {error, {ok, {[],_}}}} =
 2679: 	fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[]}}),
 2680: 
 2681:     terminate(SimplePid,shutdown),
 2682:     ok.
 2683: 
 2684: fake_upgrade(Pid,NewInitReturn) ->
 2685:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 2686: 
 2687:     %% Update state to fake code change
 2688:     %% The #state record in supervisor.erl holds the arguments given
 2689:     %% to the callback init function. By replacing these arguments the
 2690:     %% init function will return something new and by that fake a code
 2691:     %% change (see init function above in this module).
 2692:     Fun = fun(State) ->
 2693: 		  Size = size(State), % 'args' is the last field in #state.
 2694: 		  setelement(Size,State,NewInitReturn)
 2695: 	  end,
 2696:     sys:replace_state(Pid,Fun),
 2697: 
 2698:     R = sys:change_code(Pid,gen_server,dummy_vsn,[]),
 2699:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2700:     R.
 2701: 
 2702: %% Test that children are started in the order they are given, and
 2703: %% terminated in the opposite order
 2704: order_of_children(_Config) ->
 2705:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2706:     %% Use child ids that are not alphabetically storted
 2707:     Id1 = ch7,
 2708:     Id2 = ch3,
 2709:     Id3 = ch10,
 2710:     Id4 = ch2,
 2711:     Id5 = ch5,
 2712:     Children =
 2713:         [{Id, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000, worker, []} ||
 2714:             Id <- [Id1,Id2,Id3,Id4,Id5]],
 2715: 
 2716:     {ok, SupPid}  = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 3600}, Children}}),
 2717: 
 2718: 
 2719:     %% Check start order (pids are growing)
 2720:     Which1 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2721:     IsPid = fun({_,P,_,_}) when is_pid(P) -> true; (_) -> false end,
 2722:     true = lists:all(IsPid,Which1),
 2723:     SortedOnPid1 = lists:keysort(2,Which1),
 2724:     [{Id1,Pid1,_,_},
 2725:      {Id2,Pid2,_,_},
 2726:      {Id3,Pid3,_,_},
 2727:      {Id4,Pid4,_,_},
 2728:      {Id5,Pid5,_,_}] = SortedOnPid1,
 2729: 
 2730:     TPid = self(),
 2731:     TraceHandler = fun({trace,P,exit,_},{Last,Ps}) when P=:=Last ->
 2732:                            TPid ! {exited,lists:reverse([P|Ps])},
 2733:                            {Last,Ps};
 2734:                       ({trace,P,exit,_},{Last,Ps}) ->
 2735:                            {Last,[P|Ps]};
 2736:                       (_T,Acc) ->
 2737:                            Acc
 2738:                    end,
 2739: 
 2740:     %% Terminate Pid3 and check that Pid4 and Pid5 are terminated in
 2741:     %% expected order.
 2742:     Expected1 = [Pid5,Pid4],
 2743:     {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(process,{TraceHandler,{Pid4,[]}}),
 2744:     [{ok,[_]} = dbg:p(P,procs) || P <- Expected1],
 2745:     terminate(Pid3, abnormal),
 2746:     receive {exited,ExitedPids1} ->
 2747:             dbg:stop(),
 2748:             case ExitedPids1 of
 2749:                 Expected1 -> ok;
 2750:                 _ -> ct:fail({faulty_termination_order,
 2751:                               {expected,Expected1},
 2752:                               {got,ExitedPids1}})
 2753:             end
 2754:     after 3000 ->
 2755:             dbg:stop(),
 2756:             ct:fail({shutdown_fail,timeout})
 2757:     end,
 2758: 
 2759:     %% Then check that Id3-5 are started again in correct order
 2760:     Which2 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2761:     true = lists:all(IsPid,Which2),
 2762:     SortedOnPid2 = lists:keysort(2,Which2),
 2763:     [{Id1,Pid1,_,_},
 2764:      {Id2,Pid2,_,_},
 2765:      {Id3,Pid32,_,_},
 2766:      {Id4,Pid42,_,_},
 2767:      {Id5,Pid52,_,_}] = SortedOnPid2,
 2768: 
 2769:     %% Terminate supervisor and check that all children are terminated
 2770:     %% in opposite start order
 2771:     Expected2 = [Pid52,Pid42,Pid32,Pid2,Pid1],
 2772:     {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(process,{TraceHandler,{Pid1,[]}}),
 2773:     [{ok,[_]} = dbg:p(P,procs) || P <- Expected2],
 2774:     exit(SupPid,shutdown),
 2775:     receive {exited,ExitedPids2} ->
 2776:             dbg:stop(),
 2777:             case ExitedPids2 of
 2778:                 Expected2 -> ok;
 2779:                 _ -> ct:fail({faulty_termination_order,
 2780:                               {expected,Expected2},
 2781:                               {got,ExitedPids2}})
 2782:             end
 2783:     after 3000 ->
 2784:             dbg:stop(),
 2785:             ct:fail({shutdown_fail,timeout})
 2786:     end,
 2787:     ok.
 2788: 
 2789: %% Test that a non-simple supervisor scales well for starting and
 2790: %% stopping many children.
 2791: scale_start_stop_many_children(_Config) ->
 2792:     case erlang:system_info(build_type) of
 2793:         opt -> scale_start_stop_many_children();
 2794:         Other -> {skip,"Run on build type 'opt' only (current: '" ++
 2795:                       atom_to_list(Other)++"')"}
 2796:     end.
 2797: 
 2798: scale_start_stop_many_children() ->
 2799:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2800:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2801:     N1 = 1000,
 2802:     N2 = 100000,
 2803:     Ids1 = lists:seq(1,N1),
 2804:     Ids2 = lists:seq(1,N2),
 2805:     Children1 = [{Id,{supervisor_1,start_child,[]},permanent,1000,worker,[]} ||
 2806:                     Id <- Ids1],
 2807:     Children2 = [{Id,{supervisor_1,start_child,[]},permanent,1000,worker,[]} ||
 2808:                     Id <- Ids2],
 2809: 
 2810:     {StartT1,_} =
 2811:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2812:                          [supervisor:start_child(sup_test,C) || C <- Children1]
 2813:                  end),
 2814:     {StopT1,_} =
 2815:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2816:                          [supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,I) || I <- Ids1]
 2817:                  end),
 2818:     ct:log("~w children, start time: ~w ms, stop time: ~w ms",
 2819:            [N1, StartT1 div 1000, StopT1 div 1000]),
 2820: 
 2821:     {StartT2,_} =
 2822:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2823:                          [supervisor:start_child(sup_test,C) || C <- Children2]
 2824:                  end),
 2825:     {StopT2,_} =
 2826:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2827:                          [supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,I) || I <- Ids2]
 2828:                  end),
 2829:     ct:log("~w children, start time: ~w ms, stop time: ~w ms",
 2830:            [N2, StartT2 div 1000, StopT2 div 1000]),
 2831: 
 2832:     TimerAdjustment =
 2833:         case os:type() of
 2834:             {win32,_} ->
 2835:                 %% Windows timer unit is really bad...
 2836:                 16000;
 2837:             _ ->
 2838:                 %% To avoid div by zero
 2839:                 1
 2840:         end,
 2841: 
 2842:     %% Scaling should be more or less linear, but allowing a bit more
 2843:     %% to avoid false alarms (add 1 to avoid div zero)
 2844:     ScaleLimit = (N2 div N1) * 10,
 2845:     StartScale = StartT2 div (StartT1+TimerAdjustment),
 2846:     StopScale = StopT2 div (StopT1+TimerAdjustment),
 2847: 
 2848:     ct:log("Scale limit: ~w~nStart scale: ~w~nStop scale: ~w",
 2849:            [ScaleLimit, StartScale, StopScale]),
 2850: 
 2851:     if StartScale > ScaleLimit ->
 2852:             ct:fail({bad_start_scale,StartScale});
 2853:        StopScale > ScaleLimit ->
 2854:             ct:fail({bad_stop_scale,StopScale});
 2855:        true ->
 2856:             ok
 2857:     end,
 2858: 
 2859:     ok.
 2860: 
 2861: %% Test report callback for Logger handler error_logger
 2862: format_log_1(_Config) ->
 2863:     FD = application:get_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth),
 2864:     application:unset_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth),
 2865:     Term = lists:seq(1, 15),
 2866:     Supervisor = my_supervisor,
 2867:     Name = self(),
 2868:     Error = shutdown_error,
 2869:     Child = [{pid,Name},{id,any_id},
 2870:              {mfargs,{mod,func,[any,Term]}},
 2871:              {restart_type,temporary},
 2872:              {shutdown,brutal_kill},
 2873:              {child_type,worker}],
 2874:     Report = #{label=>{supervisor,Error},
 2875:                report=>[{supervisor,Supervisor},
 2876:                         {errorContext,Error},
 2877:                         {reason,Term},
 2878:                         {offender,Child}]},
 2879:     {F1, A1} = supervisor:format_log(Report),
 2880:     FExpected1 = "    supervisor: ~tp~n"
 2881:         "    errorContext: ~tp~n"
 2882:         "    reason: ~tp~n"
 2883:         "    offender: ~tp~n",
 2884:     ct:log("F1: ~ts~nA1: ~tp", [F1,A1]),
 2885:     FExpected1 = F1,
 2886:     [Supervisor,Error,Term,Child] = A1,
 2887: 
 2888:     Progress = #{label=>{supervisor,progress},
 2889:                  report=>[{supervisor,Supervisor},{started,Child}]},
 2890:     {PF1,PA1} = supervisor:format_log(Progress),
 2891:     PFExpected1 = "    supervisor: ~tp~n    started: ~tp~n",
 2892:     ct:log("PF1: ~ts~nPA1: ~tp", [PF1,PA1]),
 2893:     PFExpected1 = PF1,
 2894:     [Supervisor,Child] = PA1,
 2895: 
 2896:     Depth = 10,
 2897:     ok = application:set_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth, Depth),
 2898:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2899:     {F2,A2} = supervisor:format_log(Report),
 2900:     FExpected2 = "    supervisor: ~tP~n"
 2901:         "    errorContext: ~tP~n"
 2902:         "    reason: ~tP~n"
 2903:         "    offender: ~tP~n",
 2904:     ct:log("F2: ~ts~nA2: ~tp", [F2,A2]),
 2905:     FExpected2 = F2,
 2906:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2907:     LimitedChild = [{pid,Name},{id,any_id},
 2908:                     {mfargs,{mod,func,[any,'...']}},
 2909:                     {restart_type,temporary},
 2910:                     {shutdown,brutal_kill},
 2911:                     {child_type,worker}],
 2912: 
 2913:     [Supervisor,Depth,Error,Depth,Limited,Depth,LimitedChild,Depth] = A2,
 2914: 
 2915:     {PF2,PA2} = supervisor:format_log(Progress),
 2916:     PFExpected2 = "    supervisor: ~tP~n    started: ~tP~n",
 2917:     ct:log("PF2: ~ts~nPA2: ~tp", [PF2,PA2]),
 2918:     PFExpected2 = PF2,
 2919:     [Supervisor,Depth,LimitedChild,Depth] = PA2,
 2920: 
 2921:     case FD of
 2922:         undefined ->
 2923:             application:unset_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth);
 2924:         _ ->
 2925:             application:set_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth, FD)
 2926:     end,
 2927:     ok.

 2931:     Term = lists:seq(1, 15),
