 3100: 
 3101: flatten_format_log(Report, Format) ->
 3102:     lists:flatten(supervisor:format_log(Report, Format)).
 3103: 
 3104: % Test that terminations of temporary non-significant children do not
 3105: % trigger auto-shutdown regardless of the supervisor's auto_shutdown
 3106: % mode.
 3107: nonsignificant_temporary(_Config) ->
 3108:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3109:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3110: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3111: 	       restart => temporary,
 3112: 	       significant => false},
 3113: 
 3114:     lists:foreach(
 3115: 	fun (AutoShutdown) ->
 3116: 	    {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3117: 
 3118: 	    % Terminating a temporary non-significant child via the supervisor
 3119: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3120: 	    {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3121: 	    link(ChildPid1),
 3122: 	    terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1, child1, supervisor),
 3123: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3124: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3125: 
 3126: 	    % Killing a temporary non-significant child should not trigger
 3127: 	    % auto-shutdown.
 3128: 	    {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3129: 	    link(ChildPid2),
 3130: 	    terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3131: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3132: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3133: 
 3134: 	    % Abnormal termination of a temporary non-significant child
 3135: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3136: 	    {ok, ChildPid3} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3137: 	    link(ChildPid3),
 3138: 	    terminate(ChildPid3, abnormal),
 3139: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3140: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3141: 
 3142: 	    % Normal termination of a temporary non-significant child
 3143: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3144: 	    {ok, ChildPid4} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3145: 	    link(ChildPid4),
 3146: 	    terminate(ChildPid4, normal),
 3147: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid4]),
 3148: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3149: 
 3150: 	    terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3151: 	    ok = check_exit([Sup1])
 3152: 	end,
 3153: 	[never, any_significant, all_significant]),
 3154: 
 3155:     ok.
 3156: 
 3157: % Test that terminations of transient non-significant children do not
 3158: % trigger auto-shutdown regardless of the supervisor's auto_shutdown
 3159: % mode.
 3160: nonsignificant_transient(_Config) ->
 3161:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3162:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3163: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3164: 	       restart => transient,
 3165: 	       significant => false},
 3166: 
 3167:     lists:foreach(
 3168: 	fun (AutoShutdown) ->
 3169: 	    {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3170: 					    auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3171: 
 3172: 	    % Terminating a transient non-significant child via the supervisor
 3173: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3174: 	    {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3175: 	    link(ChildPid1),
 3176: 	    terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1, child1, supervisor),
 3177: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3178: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3179: 
 3180: 	    % Killing a transient non-significant child should not trigger
 3181: 	    % auto-shutdown. The killed child should be restarted.
 3182: 	    {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3183: 	    link(ChildPid2),
 3184: 	    terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3185: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3186: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3187: 
 3188: 	    % Abnormal termination of a transient non-significant child should
 3189: 	    % not trigger auto-shutdown. The terminated child should be restarted.
 3190: 	    [{child1, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3191: 	    link(ChildPid3),
 3192: 	    terminate(ChildPid3, abnormal),
 3193: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3194: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3195: 
 3196: 	    % Normal termination of a transient non-significant child should not
 3197: 	    % trigger  auto-shutdown.
 3198: 	    [{child1, ChildPid4, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3199: 	    link(ChildPid4),
 3200: 	    terminate(ChildPid4, normal),
 3201: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid4]),
 3202: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3203: 
 3204: 	    terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3205: 	    ok = check_exit([Sup1])
 3206: 	end,
 3207: 	[never, any_significant, all_significant]),
 3208: 
 3209:     ok.
 3210: 
 3211: % Test the auto-shutdown feature with temporary significant children.
 3212: significant_temporary(_Config) ->
 3213:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3214:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3215: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3216: 	       restart => temporary,
 3217: 	       significant => true},
 3218:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3219: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3220: 	       restart => temporary,
 3221: 	       significant => true},
 3222:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3223: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3224: 	       restart => temporary,
 3225: 	       significant => false},
 3226: 
 3227:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of any significant child.
 3228: 
 3229:     % Terminating a temporary significant child via the supervisor should not
 3230:     % trigger auto-shutdown.
 3231:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3232: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3233:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3234:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3235:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child3),
 3236:     [{child3, ChildPid1_3, _, _},
 3237:      {child2, ChildPid1_2, _, _},
 3238:      {child1, ChildPid1_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3239:     link(ChildPid1_1),
 3240:     link(ChildPid1_2),
 3241:     link(ChildPid1_3),
 3242:     terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1_1, child1, supervisor),
 3243:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1_1]),
 3244:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_2], 1000),
 3245:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_3], 1000),
 3246:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3247: 
 3248:     % Killing a temporary significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3249:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3250:     [{child1, ChildPid2_1, _, _},
 3251:      {child3, ChildPid2_3, _, _},
 3252:      {child2, ChildPid2_2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3253:     link(ChildPid2_1),
 3254:     link(ChildPid2_2),
 3255:     link(ChildPid2_3),
 3256:     terminate(ChildPid2_1, kill),
 3257:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2_1, ChildPid2_2, ChildPid2_3, Sup1]),
 3258: 
 3259:     % Abnormal termination of a temporary significant child should trigger
 3260:     % auto-shutdown.
 3261:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3262: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3263:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child1),
 3264:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child2),
 3265:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 3266:     [{child3, ChildPid3_3, _, _},
 3267:      {child2, ChildPid3_2, _, _},
 3268:      {child1, ChildPid3_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3269:     link(ChildPid3_1),
 3270:     link(ChildPid3_2),
 3271:     link(ChildPid3_3),
 3272:     terminate(ChildPid3_1, abnormal),
 3273:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3_1, ChildPid3_2, ChildPid3_3, Sup2]),
 3274: 
 3275:     % Normal termination of a temporary significant child should trigger
 3276:     % auto-shutdown.
 3277:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3278: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3279:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child1),
 3280:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child2),
 3281:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child3),
 3282:     [{child3, ChildPid4_3, _, _},
 3283:      {child2, ChildPid4_2, _, _},
 3284:      {child1, ChildPid4_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3285:     link(ChildPid4_1),
 3286:     link(ChildPid4_2),
 3287:     link(ChildPid4_3),
 3288:     terminate(ChildPid4_1, normal),
 3289:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid4_1, ChildPid4_2, ChildPid4_3, Sup3]),
 3290: 
 3291:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of all significant children.
 3292: 
 3293:     {ok, Sup4} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3294: 				    auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3295: 
 3296:     % The termination of only one of the two significant children should
 3297:     % not trigger auto-shutdown. The termination of the second (last of the two)
 3298:     % significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3299:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child1),
 3300:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child2),
 3301:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child3),
 3302:     [{child3, ChildPid5_3, _, _},
 3303:      {child2, ChildPid5_2, _, _},
 3304:      {child1, ChildPid5_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup4),
 3305:     link(ChildPid5_1),
 3306:     link(ChildPid5_2),
 3307:     link(ChildPid5_3),
 3308:     terminate(ChildPid5_1, normal),
 3309:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_1]),
 3310:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_2], 1000),
 3311:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_3], 1000),
 3312:     error = check_exit([Sup4], 1000),
 3313:     terminate(ChildPid5_2, normal),
 3314:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_2, ChildPid5_3, Sup4]),
 3315: 
 3316:     ok.
 3317: 
 3318: % Test the auto-shutdown feature with transient significant children.
 3319: significant_transient(_Config) ->
 3320:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3321:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3322:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3323:                restart => transient,
 3324:                significant => true},
 3325:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3326:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3327:                restart => transient,
 3328:                significant => true},
 3329:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3330:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3331:                restart => transient,
 3332:                significant => false},
 3333: 
 3334:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of any significant child.
 3335: 
 3336:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3337: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3338: 
 3339:     % Terminating a transient significant child via the supervisor should not
 3340:     % trigger auto-shutdown.
 3341:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3342:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3343:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child3),
 3344:     [{child3, ChildPid1_3, _, _},
 3345:      {child2, ChildPid1_2, _, _},
 3346:      {child1, ChildPid1_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3347:     link(ChildPid1_1),
 3348:     link(ChildPid1_2),
 3349:     link(ChildPid1_3),
 3350:     terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1_1, child1, supervisor),
 3351:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1_1]),
 3352:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_2], 1000),
 3353:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_3], 1000),
 3354:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3355:     supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3356: 
 3357:     % Killing a transient significant child should not trigger
 3358:     % auto-shutdown. The killed child should be restarted.
 3359:     [{child3, ChildPid2_3, _, _},
 3360:      {child2, ChildPid2_2, _, _},
 3361:      {child1, ChildPid2_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3362:     link(ChildPid2_1),
 3363:     link(ChildPid2_2),
 3364:     link(ChildPid2_3),
 3365:     terminate(ChildPid2_1, kill),
 3366:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2_1]),
 3367:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2_2], 1000),
 3368:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2_3], 1000),
 3369:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3370: 
 3371:     % Abnormal termination of a transient significant child should not trigger
 3372:     % auto-shutdown. The terminated child should be restarted.
 3373:     [{child3, ChildPid3_3, _, _},
 3374:      {child2, ChildPid3_2, _, _},
 3375:      {child1, ChildPid3_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3376:     link(ChildPid3_1),
 3377:     link(ChildPid3_2),
 3378:     link(ChildPid3_3),
 3379:     terminate(ChildPid3_1, abnormal),
 3380:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3_1]),
 3381:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3_2], 1000),
 3382:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3_3], 1000),
 3383:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3384: 
 3385:     % Normal termination of a transient significant child should trigger
 3386:     % auto-shutdown.
 3387:     [{child3, ChildPid4_3, _, _},
 3388:      {child2, ChildPid4_2, _, _},
 3389:      {child1, ChildPid4_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3390:     link(ChildPid4_1),
 3391:     link(ChildPid4_2),
 3392:     link(ChildPid4_3),
 3393:     terminate(ChildPid4_1, normal),
 3394:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid4_1, ChildPid4_2, ChildPid4_3, Sup1]),
 3395: 
 3396:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of all significant children.
 3397: 
 3398:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3399: 				    auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3400: 
 3401:     % The termination of only one of the two significant children should
 3402:     % not trigger auto-shutdown. The termination of the second (last of the two)
 3403:     % significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3404:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child1),
 3405:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child2),
 3406:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 3407:     [{child3, ChildPid5_3, _, _},
 3408:      {child2, ChildPid5_2, _, _},
 3409:      {child1, ChildPid5_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3410:     link(ChildPid5_1),
 3411:     link(ChildPid5_2),
 3412:     link(ChildPid5_3),
 3413:     terminate(ChildPid5_1, normal),
 3414:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_1]),
 3415:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_2], 1000),
 3416:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_3], 1000),
 3417:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3418:     terminate(ChildPid5_2, normal),
 3419:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_2, ChildPid5_3, Sup2]),
 3420: 
 3421:     ok.
 3422: 
 3423: % The auto-shutdown feature is not allowed with simple_one_for_one supervisors.
 3424: significant_simple(_Config) ->
 3425:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3426:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3427: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 3428: 
 3429:     {error, {supervisor_data, {bad_combination, _}}} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3430:                                                                           auto_shutdown => any_significant},
 3431:                                                                         [Child1]}}),
 3432: 
 3433:     {error, {supervisor_data, {bad_combination, _}}} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3434:                                                                           auto_shutdown => all_significant},
 3435:                                                                         [Child1]}}),
 3436: 
 3437:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3438:                                       auto_shutdown => never},
 3439:                                     [Child1]}}),
 3440:     terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 3441:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 3442: 
 3443: % Test that terminations of significant children caused by
 3444: % the death of a sibling does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3445: significant_bystander(_Config) ->
 3446:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3447:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3448:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3449:                restart => transient,
 3450:                significant => true},
 3451:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3452:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3453:                restart => transient,
 3454:                significant => false},
 3455:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3456:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3457:                restart => transient,
 3458:                significant => true},
 3459: 
 3460:     lists:foreach(
 3461:         fun ({Strategy, AutoShutdown}) ->
 3462:             {ok, Sup} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => Strategy,
 3463:                                            intensity => 5,
 3464:                                            auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3465:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child1),
 3466:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child2),
 3467:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child3),
 3468:             [{child3, ChildPid3, _, _},
 3469:              {child2, ChildPid2, _, _},
 3470:              {child1, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
 3471:             link(ChildPid1),
 3472:             link(ChildPid2),
 3473:             link(ChildPid3),
 3474:             terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3475:             _ = case Strategy of
 3476: 		one_for_one ->
 3477: 		    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3478: 		    error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3479: 		    error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000);
 3480:                 one_for_all ->
 3481:                     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, ChildPid3]);
 3482:                 rest_for_one ->
 3483:                     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, ChildPid3]),
 3484:                     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000)
 3485:             end,
 3486:             error = check_exit([Sup], 1000),
 3487:             terminate(Sup, shutdown),
 3488:             ok = check_exit([Sup])
 3489:         end,
 3490:         [
 3491:             {Strategy, AutoShutdown}
 3492:             ||
 3493:                 Strategy <- [one_for_one, one_for_all, rest_for_one],
 3494:                 AutoShutdown <- [any_significant, all_significant]
 3495:         ]
 3496:     ),
 3497: 
 3498:     ok.
 3499: 
 3500: % Test auto-shutdown escalation. 
 3501: significant_escalation(_Config) ->
 3502:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3503:     ChildSup1 = #{id => sup1,
 3504: 		  start => {supervisor,
 3505: 			    start_link,
 3506: 			    [?MODULE, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}]},
 3507: 		  restart => transient,
 3508:                   type => supervisor},
 3509:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3510:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3511:                restart => transient,
 3512:                significant => true},
 3513: 
 3514:     % Supervisor A has another supervisor B as a significant child, and supervisor B
 3515:     % has a worker C as a significant child. A and B have auto-shutdown enabled.
 3516:     % When C terminates, it should cause the auto-shutdown of B, and the termination
 3517:     % of B should in turn cause the auto-shutdown of A.
 3518:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3519:     {ok, ChildSupPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, ChildSup1#{significant => true}),
 3520:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(ChildSupPid1, Child1),
 3521:     link(ChildSupPid1),
 3522:     link(ChildPid1),
 3523:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3524:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildSupPid1, Sup1]),
 3525: 
 3526:     % Supervisor A has another supervisor B as a non-significant child, and supervisor B
 3527:     % has a worker C as a significant child. A and B have auto-shutdown enabled.
 3528:     % When C terminates, it should cause the auto-shutdown of B, but the termination
 3529:     % of B should not in turn cause the auto-shutdown of A.
 3530:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3531:     {ok, ChildSupPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, ChildSup1#{significant => false}),
 3532:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(ChildSupPid2, Child1),
 3533:     link(ChildSupPid2),
 3534:     link(ChildPid2),
 3535:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3536:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, ChildSupPid2]),
 3537:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3538:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 3539:     ok = check_exit([Sup2]),
 3540: 
 3541:     ok.
 3542: 
 3543: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from never to any_significant.
 3544: significant_upgrade_never_any(_Config) ->
 3545:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3546:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3547: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3548: 	       restart => transient,
 3549: 	       significant => true},
 3550:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3551: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3552: 	       restart => transient,
 3553: 	       significant => true},
 3554:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3555:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3556:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3557:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3558:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3559:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3560:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3561:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3562:     link(ChildPid1),
 3563:     link(ChildPid2),
 3564:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3565:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3566:     ok.
 3567: 
 3568: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to never.
 3569: significant_upgrade_any_never(_Config) ->
 3570:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3571:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3572: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3573: 	       restart => transient,
 3574: 	       significant => true},
 3575:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3576: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3577: 	       restart => transient,
 3578: 	       significant => true},
 3579:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3580:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3581:     link(ChildPid1),
 3582:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3583:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3584:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3585:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3586:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3587:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3588:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3589:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3590:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3591:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3592:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3593:     link(ChildPid2),
 3594:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3595:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3596:     ok.
 3597: 
 3598: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from never to all_significant.
 3599: significant_upgrade_never_all(_Config) ->
 3600:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3601:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3602: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3603: 	       restart => transient,
 3604: 	       significant => true},
 3605:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3606: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3607: 	       restart => transient,
 3608: 	       significant => true},
 3609:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3610:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3611:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3612:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3613:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3614:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3615:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3616:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3617:     link(ChildPid1),
 3618:     link(ChildPid2),
 3619:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3620:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3621:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3622:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3623:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3624:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3625:     ok.
 3626: 
 3627: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to never.
 3628: significant_upgrade_all_never(_Config) ->
 3629:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3630:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3631: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3632: 	       restart => transient,
 3633: 	       significant => true},
 3634:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3635: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3636: 	       restart => transient,
 3637: 	       significant => true},
 3638:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3639:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3640:     link(ChildPid1),
 3641:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3642:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3643:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3644:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3645:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3646:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3647:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3648:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3649:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3650:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3651:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3652:     link(ChildPid2),
 3653:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3654:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3655:     ok.
 3656: 
 3657: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to all_significant.
 3658: significant_upgrade_any_all(_Config) ->
 3659:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3660:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3661: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3662: 	       restart => transient,
 3663: 	       significant => true},
 3664:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3665: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3666: 	       restart => transient,
 3667: 	       significant => true},
 3668:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3669:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3670:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3671:     link(ChildPid1),
 3672:     link(ChildPid2),
 3673:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3674:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3675:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3676:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3677:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3678:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3679:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3680:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3681:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3682:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3683:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3684:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3685:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3686:     ok.
 3687: 
 3688: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to any_significant.
 3689: significant_upgrade_all_any(_Config) ->
 3690:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3691:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3692: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3693: 	       restart => transient,
 3694: 	       significant => true},
 3695:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3696: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3697: 	       restart => transient,
 3698: 	       significant => true},
 3699:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3700:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3701:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3702:     link(ChildPid1),
 3703:     link(ChildPid2),
 3704:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3705:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3706:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3707:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3708:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3709:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3710:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3711:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3712:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3713:     ok.
 3714: 
 3715: % Test upgrading a child from non-significant to significant
 3716: % and vice versa.
 3717: significant_upgrade_child(_Config) ->
 3718:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3719:     Child1 = #{id => child,
 3720: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3721: 	      restart => transient,
 3722: 	      significant => false},
 3723:     Child2 = #{id => child,
 3724: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3725: 	      restart => transient,
 3726: 	      significant => true},
 3727: 
 3728:     % A supervisor with auto-shutdown set to never should not allow upgrading
 3729:     % a non-significant child to significant.
 3730:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child1]}}),
 3731:     [{child, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3732:     link(ChildPid1),
 3733:     S1_1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3734:     {error, _} = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child2]}}),
 3735:     S1_2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3736:     true = (S1_1 /= S1_2),
 3737:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3738:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3739:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3740:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, Sup1]),
 3741: 
 3742:     % Start with a non-significant child, upgrade it to significant
 3743:     % and ensure that it triggers auto-shutdown.
 3744:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3745:     [{child, ChildPid2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3746:     link(ChildPid2),
 3747:     S2_1 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3748:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup2, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3749:     S2_2 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3750:     true = (S2_1 /= S2_2),
 3751:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3752:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3753:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3754:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup2]),
 3755: 
 3756:     % Start with a significant child, upgrade it to non-significant
 3757:     % and ensure that it does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3758:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3759:     [{child, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3760:     link(ChildPid3),
 3761:     S3_1 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3762:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup3, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3763:     S3_2 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3764:     true = (S3_1 /= S3_2),
 3765:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3], 1000),
 3766:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3767:     terminate(ChildPid3, normal),
 3768:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3769:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3770:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown),
 3771:     ok = check_exit([Sup3]),
 3772: 
 3773:     ok.
 3774: 
 3775: %% Test trying to start a child that uses an already registered name.
 3776: already_started_outside_supervisor(_Config) ->
 3777:     %% Avoid inter-testcase flakiness
 3778:     ensure_supervisor_is_stopped(),
 3779:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3780:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
 3781:     RegName = registered_name,
 3782:     Child = #{id => child,
 3783: 	      start => {?MODULE, start_registered_name, [RegName]},
 3784: 	      restart => transient,
 3785: 	      significant => false},
 3786:     %% We start another process and register the name.
 3787:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3788:                              true = register(RegName, self()),
 3789:                              receive
 3790:                                  die -> ok
 3791:                              end
 3792:                      end),
 3793:     {error, {already_started, P}} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, Child),
 3794:     Pid = P,
 3795:     terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 3796:     Pid ! die,
 3797:     ok = check_exit([SupPid]),
 3798:     ok.
 3799: 
 3800: %% Test which_children/1 and which_child/2.
 3801: which_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3802:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
 3803: 
 3804:     [] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3805:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, childx),
 3806: 
 3807:     {ok, Child1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, #{id => child1,
 3808: 						    start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []}}),
 3809:     [{child1, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3810:     {ok, {child1, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child1),
 3811:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, childx),
 3812: 
 3813:     {ok, Child2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, #{id => child2,
 3814: 						    start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []}}),
 3815:     [{child2, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]},
 3816:      {child1, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3817:     {ok, {child1, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child1),
 3818:     {ok, {child2, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child2),
 3819:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, childx),
 3820: 
 3821:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, child1),
 3822:     [{child2, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]},
 3823:      {child1, undefined, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3824:     {ok, {child1, undefined, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child1),
 3825:     {ok, {child2, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child2),
 3826:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, childx),
 3827: 
 3828:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(SupPid, child1),
 3829:     [{child2, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3830:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child1),
 3831:     {ok, {child2, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, child2),
 3832:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, childx),
 3833: 
 3834:     ok.
 3835: 
 3836: which_children_simple_one_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3837:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one}, [#{id => child,
 3838: 									  start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3839: 									  restart => temporary}]}}),
 3840: 
 3841:     [] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3842:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, self()),
 3843: 
 3844:     {ok, Child1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 3845:     [{undefined, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3846:     {ok, {undefined, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, Child1),
 3847:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, self()),
 3848: 
 3849:     {ok, Child2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 3850:     [{undefined, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]},
 3851:      {undefined, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3852:     {ok, {undefined, Child1, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, Child1),
 3853:     {ok, {undefined, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, Child2),
 3854:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, self()),
 3855: 
 3856:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Child1),
 3857:     [{undefined, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 3858:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, Child1),
 3859:     {ok, {undefined, Child2, worker, [supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, Child2),
 3860:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, self()),
 3861: 
 3862:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:which_child(SupPid, not_a_pid),
 3863: 
 3864:     ok.
 3865: 
 3866: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3867: terminate(Pid, Reason) when Reason =/= supervisor ->
 3868:     terminate(dummy, Pid, dummy, Reason).
 3869: 
 3870: terminate(Sup, _, ChildId, supervisor) ->
 3871:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(Sup, ChildId);
 3872: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, kill) ->
 3873:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3874:     exit(ChildPid, kill),
 3875:     receive
 3876: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, killed} ->
 3877: 	    ok
 3878:     end;
 3879: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, shutdown) ->
 3880:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3881:     exit(ChildPid, shutdown),
 3882:     receive
 3883: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, shutdown} ->
 3884: 	    ok
 3885:     end;
 3886: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, {shutdown, Term}) ->
 3887:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3888:     exit(ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}),
 3889:     receive
 3890: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}} ->
 3891: 	    ok
 3892:     end;
 3893: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, normal) ->
 3894:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3895:     ChildPid ! stop,
 3896:     receive
 3897: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, normal} ->
 3898: 	    ok
 3899:     end;
 3900: terminate(_, ChildPid, _,abnormal) ->
 3901:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3902:     ChildPid ! die,
 3903:     receive
 3904: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, died} ->
 3905: 	    ok
 3906:     end.
 3907: 
 3908: in_child_list([], _) ->
 3909:     true;
 3910: in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3911:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3912: 	true ->
 3913: 	    in_child_list(Rest, Pids);
 3914: 	false ->
 3915: 	    ct:fail(child_should_be_alive)
 3916:     end.
 3917: not_in_child_list([], _) ->
 3918:     true;
 3919: not_in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3920:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3921: 	true ->
 3922: 	    ct:fail(child_should_not_be_alive);
 3923: 	false ->
 3924: 	    not_in_child_list(Rest, Pids)
 3925:     end.
 3926: 
 3927: is_in_child_list(Pid, ChildPids) ->
 3928:     lists:member(Pid, ChildPids).
 3929: 
 3930: check_exit(Pids) ->
 3931:     check_exit(Pids, infinity).
 3932: 
 3933: check_exit([], _Timeout) ->
 3934:     ok;
 3935: check_exit([Pid | Pids], Timeout) ->
 3936:     receive
 3937: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
 3938: 	    check_exit(Pids, Timeout)
 3939:     after Timeout ->
 3940: 	error
 3941:     end.
 3942: 
 3943: check_exit_reason(Pid, Reason) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3944:     receive
 3945: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
 3946: 	    ok;
 3947: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Else} ->
 3948: 	    ct:fail({bad_exit_reason, Else})
 3949:     end.
 3950: 
 3951: check_no_exit(Timeout) ->
 3952:     receive
 3953:         {'EXIT', Pid, _} = Exit when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3954:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Exit})
 3955:     after Timeout ->
 3956:             ok
 3957:     end.
 3958: 
 3959: start_registered_name(Name) ->
 3960:     supervisor:start_link({local, Name}, ?MODULE, []).
 3961: 
 3962: ensure_supervisor_is_stopped() ->
 3963:     case whereis(sup_test) of
 3964:         undefined ->
 3965:             ok;
 3966:         Pid ->
 3967:             terminate(Pid, shutdown)
 3968:     end.
 3969: 
 3970: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 3971: %% The Logger handler used.
 3972: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 3973: log(#{meta := #{mfa := {supervisor,do_restart,3}}}, #{test_case_pid := Pid}) ->
 3974:     Pid ! ok;
 3975: log(#{level := info, msg := Msg}, #{test_case_pid := Pid}) ->
 3976:     Pid ! {fail, Msg}.
